title: Chicken and Kidney Bean Soup
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '425g passata', '1.5 litres water', '4 tablespoons diced onion', '450g boneless chicken breast fillets, cooked and cubed', '1 (410g) tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '100g broccoli', '125g diced carrots', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon Cajun seasoning', '1 pinch garlic granules']
